song.title: Final Fantasy Adventure
song.info:
Final Fantasy Adventure songs remixed: 1: Seiken Densetsu Overworld "Endless Battlefield" 2: Final Fantasy Prelude
For the X6 competition, October 10th, 1999.
Song Message:
Ahhh... back to the days when remixes sounded decent and only took up 100 KB or so. Well, I'm kidding. This aint that great, and it's a little over 100 KB.. but at least I got this song to sound how I truly wanted it to at heart. This is the kind of music I hear when I listen to Final Fantasy music. Let's hope that I can continue to have as much fun making remixes as I have this one, ne? :) Thank you for listening.
Thanks to:
Thanks to Blackganon, altima, and other miscellaneous artists whose songs I got my samples from.
Hellos:
altima Detrafilia BlackGanon (turbotoo) JChance Unipsycho Erdrick Aeon Darkhalo Mune Norg (Thanks for the inspiration bro) NintendoGuru Khalal ]V[ash-lo (you know who you are! Forgive the spelling errors. :)
And others I forgot to mention. Sowwie! :)
Peace out.
skyline
(artist formerly known as Dragoon-kun; Aaron Leibrick)
